title.narrative: Towards more effective and accountable social protection systems for income security in older age

description.narrative: Evidence and learning generated on social protection systems and best practice in citizen monitoring
Innovative OCM models are piloted in each target country, generating evidence on the effectiveness of social protection programmes
Key local, national and international stakeholders have increased technical knowledge to design and implement accountable social protection systems
Representative OPAs at local and national levels have strengthened capacity to participate in social accountability processes || |
Social protection systems providing income security in older age in developing countries are more effective and accountable.
